text: thumb|right|200px|Němcová in 2018 Petra Němcová (; born 24 June 1979) is a Czech model, television host and philanthropist. She was born in Karviná, Czechoslovakia. She founded the Happy Hearts Fund. In 2017, the Happy Hearts Fund merged with All Hands Volunteers to create All Hands And Hearts - Smart Response, with Němcová having the role of co-founder and vice chair. In 2017, Petra was appointed by the UNISDR as a Disaster Risk Reduction Champion and Tsunami Awareness Advocate. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Czech writers Category:Czech models Category:European philanthropists Category:Czech television presenters
